backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining AC service booking system with CRUD operations for bookings (create, read, update status, delete) and types for ServiceType, BookingStatus, and Booking stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: booking form interface, booking list/table view with status updates, and professional visual theme design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing App component, React Query hooks, Layout, BookingForm, BookingList, global styles with OKLCH color palette, and Tailwind configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark mode color schemes using OKLCH color space for a professional teal/blue theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'AC Service Booking App', and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping BookingForm and BookingList in Layout with ThemeProvider and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Form component with controlled inputs for customer details, service type selection, date/time pickers, and address using shadcn UI components with icons and validation.
frontend/src/components/BookingList.tsx: Table component displaying all bookings with inline status dropdown updates, delete confirmation dialog, loading skeletons, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header with logo and branding, main content area, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes, and anonymous actor fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for booking operations (getAllBookings, createBooking, updateBookingStatus, deleteBooking) with toast notifications and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a professional teal/blue color palette for light and dark modes suitable for an AC service application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an AC service booking app with three existing features (booking form, booking list, professional theme) and five pending backend-related feature requests.
